texto: to the sensitivity of the data, additional care is given to identify the appropriate audiences for the various assurance measures. Information management includes the protection of sensitive information items regarding software assurance. j) The Measurement process (6.3.7), in its entirety, provides a common platform for collecting information about the software assurance claims, strategies, and evidence, sometimes referred to as an assurance case. k) The Quality Assurance process (6.3.8) evaluates project and supplier processes for conformance to software assurance requirements and procedures.
